resources.string: CBT is a specialist recruitment consultancy with a network of recruitment partners across the Globe. \n\n Click here to find out more.

Every week we share Top Profiles from our Talent Pool. 

We give a taste of our best profiles from Engineering, ICT, and BPO Tech. 

This app is a quick way to find all the best candidates from 2 categories: 
—Talent Leasing: Permanent contracts 
—International Recrutment: Temporary contracts
Want to have access to the full list of candidates?\nTo Request access to our Talent Pool you just need to send us your information.\n
